chunk:
Directions: Apply small dots of gel with fingertips to outer corners of the eye area and gently pat and press into skin. Use morning and evening.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
book: 1032-Beauty Without Cruelty Nourishing Eye Gel (2020 formulation)
